data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cho, Geonho, Burckhardt, Daniel, Lee, Seunghwan (2015): Rhodochlanis suaedicola sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Psylloidea: Aphalaridae) associated with Suaeda japonica (Amaranthaceae) from Korea. Zootaxa 4028 (3): 388-396, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4028.3.4
